name: Sennereiküche Zillertal
description:
Our Dairy Kitchen offers a delicious range of specialties from  Heumilchcheese and traditional Tyrolean cuisine.
All our dishes are prepared with  Heumilchproducts from our own production - the rest comes from our regional partners!
"Food and drink keep body and soul together"
Food is not only a source of energy, it also brings a feeling of wellbeing, which has positive affects towards our inner balance. 
Let us pamper you, take your time and enjoy!
On our covered sun terrace - Cheese Master, chef and our guests agree: "Culinary delights from the region - you can taste it!"
